class.name: ColorPickerButton
class.brief_description: A button that brings up a [ColorPicker] when pressed.
class.description: Encapsulates a [ColorPicker], making it accessible by pressing a button. Pressing the button will toggle the [ColorPicker]'s visibility. See also [BaseButton] which contains common properties and methods associated with this node. [b]Note:[/b] By default, the button may not be wide enough for the color preview swatch to be visible. Make sure to set [member Control.custom_minimum_size] to a big enough value to give the button enough space.

method.name: get_picker
method.description: Returns the [ColorPicker] that this node toggles. [b]Warning:[/b] This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [member CanvasItem.visible] property.

method.name: get_popup
method.description: Returns the control's [PopupPanel] which allows you to connect to popup signals. This allows you to handle events when the ColorPicker is shown or hidden. [b]Warning:[/b] This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [member Window.visible] property.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the alpha channel in the displayed [ColorPicker] will be visible.

signal.name: picker_created
signal.description: Emitted when the [ColorPicker] is created (the button is pressed for the first time).

theme_items.theme_item: The background of the color preview rect on the button.
